title: Account Protection
description: Your social media and email accounts hold details about your digital identity and your personal information. If someone gets access to these accounts, they can obtain this information or even post and content on your behalf.

securityTips.title: Use a strong and unique password
description: Use a strong password on all your accounts (social media, email, instant messaging, etc.) and do not use the same password for multiple accounts.

securityTips.title: Keep your password a secret
description: Do not share your password with others and do not enter your password in front of others. If you think your account has been infiltrated, change your password immediately.

securityTips.title: Protect your account access
description: Log out of your account after using it on a device that is not yours.

securityTips.title: Take advantage of security settings
description: Set up security & privacy settings in your account, such as limiting those who can see your posts to “friends only”, using two-factor authentication, and setting up spam protection.
